name: @kamath/mention-mcp
description:
A documentation MCP server, such that you can ask a question like:

- "How do I use #stagehand to create a computer use agent?"
- "How do I write a client component using #aisdk and the useChat hook?"

tools.name: hashtag_mention
tools.description: If a user says something like #{page}, like #aisdk, call this tool with the #'d value

query.description: Something about the page that a user might be specifically asking for. Leave null to get the full context (might be very long)

tools.name: list_docs_servers
tools.description: List all available documentation servers and their corresponding URLs, if a user asks for what documentation servers are available, call this tool
